Social Media Management

The Socialistics Way

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” make_equal=”on” module_class=”services-row” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#0582ca” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px”][et_pb_blurb title=”Onboarding” image=”https://socialistics.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/book.png” image_max_width=”15%” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#ffffff” body_text_color=”#ffffff” background_enable_color=”off” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”40px|40px|40px|40px|true|true”]

The key to any successful social media partnership is taking the necessary time to learn about your business and set ourselves up for success.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#0582ca” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px”][et_pb_blurb title=”Content” image=”https://socialistics.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/icon-7.svg” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#ffffff” body_text_color=”#ffffff” background_enable_color=”off” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”40px|40px|40px|40px|true|true”]

Everything starts with great content. We are natural storytellers, and all our content serves a purpose.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#0582ca” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px”][et_pb_blurb title=”Channel” image=”https://socialistics.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/social-media-2.png” image_max_width=”15%” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#ffffff” body_text_color=”#ffffff” background_enable_color=”off” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”40px|40px|40px|40px|true|true”]

It’s always better to be great at less, than average at everything. We’ll work with you to determine the right channel strategies, and make sure what we are doing has purpose, and isn’t just going through the motions.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” make_equal=”on” module_class=”services-row” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||30px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#0582ca” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px”][et_pb_blurb title=”Monitoring” image=”https://socialistics.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/monitoring-1.png” image_max_width=”15%” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#ffffff” body_text_color=”#ffffff” background_enable_color=”off” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”40px|40px|40px|40px|true|true”]

One of the values of working with a social media agency is not having to worry about it. That is especially true with keeping on eye out for comments, mentions and inquiries.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#0582ca” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px”][et_pb_blurb title=”Paid” image=”https://socialistics.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/dollar-symbol-1.png” image_max_width=”15%” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#ffffff” body_text_color=”#ffffff” background_enable_color=”off” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”40px|40px|40px|40px|true|true”]

We have a team dedicated just to the art and science of paid social to ensure your budgets stretch as far as they can possibly go and produce maximum results.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#0582ca” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px”][et_pb_blurb title=”Reporting” image=”https://socialistics.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/analytics-1.png” image_max_width=”15%” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#ffffff” body_text_color=”#ffffff” background_enable_color=”off” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”40px|40px|40px|40px|true|true”]

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.6.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f4f8fa” custom_margin=”15px||15px||true|false” social media MANAGEMENT

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text module_class=”team-block” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Karla||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.6em” link_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” link_text_color=”#0582ca” header_2_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#003554″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_3_font=”Montserrat|||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#0582ca” custom_margin=”||29px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”14px” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” link_font_size_tablet=”12px” link_font_size_phone=”” link_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_2_font_size_tablet=”28px” header_2_font_size_phone=”26px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_3_font_size_tablet=”20px” header_3_font_size_phone=”18px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off”]

The heart of any successful social media effort is in the stories you tell. Every story we craft for our client’s social media channels serves a purpose and is planned out months in advance. We stay on brand while weaving the perfect mix of language and imagery to drive action. We look before we leap, and make sure that your social media channels sing day in and day out.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text module_class=”team-block” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Karla||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.6em” link_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” link_text_color=”#0582ca” header_2_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#003554″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_3_font=”Montserrat|||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#0582ca” custom_margin=”||0px|30px|false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”14px” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” link_font_size_tablet=”12px” link_font_size_phone=”” link_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_2_font_size_tablet=”28px” header_2_font_size_phone=”26px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_3_font_size_tablet=”20px” header_3_font_size_phone=”18px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off”]

  • Copywriting
  • Graphic/video design
  • Reporting/analytics

Paid SOCIAL MANAGEMENT

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text module_class=”team-block” _builder_version=”4.7.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Karla||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.6em” link_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” link_text_color=”#0582ca” header_2_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#003554″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_3_font=”Montserrat|||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#0582ca” custom_margin=”||29px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”14px” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” link_font_size_tablet=”12px” link_font_size_phone=”” link_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_2_font_size_tablet=”28px” header_2_font_size_phone=”26px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_3_font_size_tablet=”20px” header_3_font_size_phone=”18px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off”]

In order to be seen on social media, it is essential to have an effective paid strategy behind your content. Gone are the days where your content can be seen organically. There’s too much traffic. We craft customized paid media strategies that follow up-to-date best practice guidelines. Custom audiences, copy, imagery and call-to-actions are just some of the ways we ensure you are seen on social media.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text module_class=”team-block” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Karla||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.6em” link_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” link_text_color=”#0582ca” header_2_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#003554″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_3_font=”Montserrat|||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#0582ca” custom_margin=”||30px|30px|false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”14px” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” link_font_size_tablet=”12px” link_font_size_phone=”” link_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_2_font_size_tablet=”28px” header_2_font_size_phone=”26px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_3_font_size_tablet=”20px” header_3_font_size_phone=”18px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off”]

B2B businesses need to think differently when it comes to leveraging social media. One of the ways we differentiate is by complementing our traditional social media management services with LinkedIn Social Sales campaigns. These campaigns are designed to target your specific ideal prospects, and build connections and conversations with them 1:1 using LinkedIn Sales Navigator and a variety of manual and automated tools/strategies. A digital sales team at your disposal driving real leads to you business to follow up with.

Custom audiences, copy, imagery and call-to-actions are just some of the ways we ensure you are seen on social media.

Paid

In order to be seen on social media, it is essential to have an effective paid strategy behind your content. Gone are the days where your content can be seen organically. There’s too much traffic. We craft customized paid media strategies that follow up-to-date best practice guidelines. Custom audiences, copy, imagery and call-to-actions are just some of the ways we ensure you are seen on social media.

Campaigns

There is no better platform than social media when it comes to launching a campaign. Whether you’re launching a new product or service, throwing or attending an event, or just have something big to tell the world, Socialistics can help you navigate a social strategy and execution that drives awareness, engagement and excitement around your campaign.

excerpt.rendered: Social Media Services -Social Media Management If you can’t connect the dots when it comes to your social media and real business results, what’s the point? Everything we do is designed to make that happen and make it easy for you to understand how. ready for your social media to actually work? Contact us today […]
